snippet: New York State will introduce a new driver’s license in July that is made of polycarbonate and has other features that officials say will make it virtually impossible to forge.
abstract: New York State will begin issuing drivers' licenses that are hard polycarbonate cards with photos that appear black and white, replacing bendable color version; move toward monochromatic license is also being tried in several other states; officials describe new licenses as important step in thwarting thriving and sophisticated counterfeit market.
lead_paragraph: New York State will introduce a new driver’s license in July that is made of polycarbonate and has other features that officials say will make it virtually impossible to forge.

headline.seo: New York State Will Fight Fake Licenses With New Tactics
headline.main: Black and White and Wallet-Size, Unfit for Faking
headline.print_headline: Black and White and Wallet-Size, Unfit for Faking
